categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, an attack was initiated on the planet Mardona III in 3 ABY by the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry against the Galactic Empire. It resulted in the death of the rebel Charmer.
The attack on Mardona III first appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
